launch.title: LAUNCH Mining
launch.subtitle: Publish your mining project to attract investors
launch.successMessage: Your mining project has been submitted successfully. We will review it within 24 hours. After approval, your mining will be displayed in the market.
launch.connectWalletPrompt: Please connect your wallet to publish a mining project
launch.name: Mining Name
launch.uploadPrompt: Click to upload or drag and drop files here
launch.imageRequirements: Supports JPG, PNG formats, recommended size 1200x630, file size not exceeding 5MB

notes.title: Mining Publication Notes
notes.review: All mining projects need to be reviewed by the platform, which usually takes 1-2 business days
notes.accuracy: Please ensure that you provide true and accurate mining information, false information will result in the project being rejected
notes.fee: Publishing mining requires a 0.1 SOL on-chain fee to ensure project authenticity
notes.management: After the mining goes online, the platform will charge a 5% management fee
notes.support: If you have any questions, please contact our customer service team: support@24k-finance.com
